title: I need help, dear riot
body: Hello everyone, I'm a young guy who loves league of legends. I live in Italy and where I live right now the internet connection is very very bad (3 mb/s max). Because of that I can't play league anymore because my ping is always high (150-200+ ms if im lucky). So today I gave up. I was wondering if I could get help in any way, I dont know how, one of them could be a refund but I dont think riot would care. Anyway, thank you for any help and sorry for my bad english

replies.body: There could be a few reasons for higher ping, and it's usually a network issue having trouble maintaining a strong connection to the game server.  You can strengthen your connection and fix up wonky settings through the troubleshooting steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Keep in mind that physical distance to the server can be a reason for higher ping as well, so any troubleshooting can't necessarily exceed that.  The guide should provide an improvement from what you have now!
i tried everything but it just doesnt work, i definitely gave up after my last game. Could we find any other solution?

Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can take a look into this with you individually.  You can also get a set of logs to attach to the ticket for context through our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  We'll respond to your ticket asap!

I used to have the same problem, but i recently moved to right beside my router and then got a ethernet/internet "the blue cord" and wired it to the router. This showed a major increase in speed 90 ms to constant 25-35ms
 
Thats all i got, hope it help
